metadata.name: Kerr 100 Triple Dye Dispos A 224 mg 100mL Solution

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Topical antiseptic used mainly in wound dressings

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Proflavine is an acriflavine derivative which is a disinfectant bacteriostatic against many gram positive bacteria Proflavine is toxic and carcinogenic in mammals and so it is used only as a surface disinfectant or for treating superficial wounds
